ai-patthana23.11:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles means to the extent of the Dhamma.
ai-patthana23.11:0.3_0: I undertaken for a small area.
ai-patthana23.11:1.1_0: Not skilled in the Teaching, or causes and reasons.
ai-patthana23.11:1.1_4: the five hindrances are not clear.
ai-patthana23.11:2.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana23.11:3.1_0: Not skilled in having a thought, skilled in the teaching, and a condition for limitless teaching.
